text: Daksha organised a yagya at 'Kanakhal' in which everybody except Shiva and Sati were invited.
Sage Dadhichi arrived and not finding the seat for Shiva went back, saying that it was impossible to accomplish a yagya without Shiva.
Then Daksha commenced the yagya with the assistance of other sages who were present there.
title: Daksha Performs Yagya
